events.title: Boston Mountain Paw Paw Festival
events.description: Free-entry harvest celebration at Beard & Lady Inn with pawpaw desserts, live music by Dreadful Day, cornhole, pageant, and growing workshops.

events.title: Bikes Blues & BBQ
events.description: The world's largest charity motorcycle rally featuring scenic rides, live music, BBQ competition, vendors, and family-friendly activities throughout Northwest Arkansas.

events.title: Arkansas Apple Festival
events.description: Celebrate the apple harvest with arts & crafts, live bluegrass music, parade at 10am Saturday, apple cider, food vendors, and family entertainment on the town square.

events.title: War Eagle Fair
events.description: Over 250 booths of handcrafted arts & crafts along War Eagle Creek. Features pottery, jewelry, woodworking, live demonstrations, music, and fall foliage.

events.title: Ozark Moonshine & Music Festival
events.description: All-day bluegrass and country music headlined by 'The Voice' star Ruby Leigh, plus craft distillery tastings, Ozark history exhibits, and hands-on activities.

events.title: Lights of the Ozarks
events.description: Northwest Arkansas' most treasured holiday tradition transforms downtown square with millions of lights, parade Dec 4, live music, Santa visits, and festive activities.

events.title: Eureka Springs Christmas Festival
events.description: Victorian Christmas celebration with Parade of Lights Dec 5, Living Windows, Tour of Homes, Santa in Basin Park, Jinglin' Jeep Parade, and holiday markets.
